doc.title: Introduction
doc.paragraph: The Developer Guide is written for two types of developers in mind: those who intend to work on Adaptive Framework Core and those who are interested in developing Adaptive Framework Packages.

This guide will provide some background and procedures for developers who wish to contribute to the Adaptive Framework project or integrate the framework into their own applications. However, you may want to read the Architecture Guide first, which will provide a more detailed overview of the Adaptive Framework and why it was designed the way it was.
Additionally, the Reference material will be helpful in referring back to, for more detailed, technical documentation. In particular, the Doxygen reference for C.
